title: Fat Suit Gragas
body:
Skin idea for Gragas, he has lost all his weight and misses it so he walks around in a fat suit

EDIT: That's Mike Myers in his Fat Bastard fat suit btw for those who don't know, not an actual fat guy. 

EDIT2: Also I mean no offense to any people suffering from obesity in any way...

EDIT3: When he dies the suit can deflate.
